title.rendered: Anisha Giridharan – 2021 OVS Graduate from Oman

content.rendered: OVS gave me the freedom to study at my own pace. There was no fixed schedule, which allowed me to spend more time on content I found difficult. Studying at OVS relieved me from all the stress of peer pressure. I truly wish I found out about OVS much earlier. OVS is a perfect platform to receive world-class education from the comfort of your own home, even if you are on the other side of the world!

title.rendered: Anna Turkington – Full-Time OVS Student & Professional Ballerina

content.rendered: I cannot narrow down what I love most about learning with OVS as there are simply too many reasons! I think my favourite aspect of the courses is the level of interaction between the teacher and student. The faculty at Ontario Virtual School is incredible. My teachers are always willing to answer course-related questions with exceptional response times, provide updates & just generally check-in to see how I’m doing.

content.rendered: I did Grade 11 University Biology with OVS. It was a phenomenal experience. I had never done an online course but with the pandemic and the accelerated nature of public courses, the “at your own pace” method of OVS was perfect! The material and the teaching of the material were concise but informative. I also found that my teacher always answered my questions very quickly and thoroughly.

content.rendered: OVS is set up to help students and have them succeed. It’s a really good program and the teachers there are very helpful. The lessons were really well laid out and easy to understand, and the assignments were very straightforward. The teacher I had was very nice, and whenever I had any questions, he never failed to make me feel comfortable. I also like that they have a guidance team to answer questions and help whenever needed.

content.rendered: Because of my disability, attending class is difficult for me to do, so I really enjoyed the freedom of attending class from home whenever I got some free time. The online access to the course 24/7 makes it extremely easy to go back and really understand every aspect of the lesson. Thank you OVS for keeping me motivated and allowing me to pursue my dreams of going to university.

content.rendered: After having been out of school for 11 years, I was nervous about studying and completing assignments again. OVS has been a great stepping stone for me and I feel much more confident about pursuing post-secondary now. I work a full-time job and have personal creative commitments, so being able to study whenever I wanted was also a huge bonus.

content.rendered: Usually, in day-school, you dont have the time to cover absolutely everything. However, with OVS I was left with an impressive understanding of the concepts, far greater than I would usually accomplish at my day school. The teachers are very helpful and respond to questions quickly. Overall, great experience & would recommend to anyone needing to catch up, get ahead, or experience online school.

content.rendered: I didn’t know what to expect but after my son completed the course, I was sorry that I didn’t learn about OVS sooner. The course is easy to navigate, turn-around of assignments was very quick, our teacher was very engaged and always available to assist with any questions. No classroom politics and the student can control the pace at which they move through the course. Very good experience and would definitely recommend them.

content.rendered:
Why Choose Ontario Virtual School
For Online High School Credits?

  • Continuous enrollment – Sign up and start anytime.
  • Finish an online course in as little as 4 weeks or as long as 12 months.
  • Dedicated, certified teachers. All in good standing with the Ontario College of Teachers.
  • Engaging and interactive content that encourages mastery before moving forward.
  • 24/7 access from anywhere in the world.
  • Marks directly sent to OUAC, OCAS, and Day School.
